title: Goodyear Microfibre Waffle Cloth I Reduces drying time with less wring outs | Ideal for bodywork & glass | Designed microfibre cloth | Statically charged cleaning fibres | Leaves lint free finish
availability_text: Only 9 left in stock (more on the way).
features: Efficient Drying: The Goodyear Microfibre Waffle Cloth is designed to reduce drying time significantly. Its advanced microfibre technology allows for superior water absorption and retention, meaning you can dry your vehicle or surfaces faster with fewer wring outs, saving you time and effort.

Perfect for Bodywork & Glass: This versatile cloth is ideal for use on both bodywork and glass surfaces. Its gentle yet effective cleaning properties make it perfect for detailing your car's exterior and achieving a streak-free finish on windows and mirrors. Waffle Cloth is designed to leave no lint or residue behind.

Advanced Microfibre Design: The cloth features a unique waffle weave pattern that enhances its cleaning performance. The microfibre material is specifically engineered to lift and trap dirt, dust, and debris, ensuring a thorough and efficient clean without scratching or damaging surfaces.

Statically Charged Cleaning Fibres: The statically charged fibres in this cloth attract and hold dust and dirt particles, making cleaning easier and more effective. This feature ensures that your surfaces are not only clean but also free from residual particles that can cause streaks or scratches.

Large Size for Maximum Coverage: Measuring generously, this large cloth provides ample coverage to tackle bigger jobs quickly and efficiently. Whether you're drying off a large vehicle or cleaning extensive glass surfaces, the size of this cloth ensures you can get the job done with fewer passes.
description: The Goodyear Microfibre Waffle Cloth Large is a must-have for anyone serious about car care. Engineered to perfection, this waffle weave microfibre cloth is designed to drastically reduce drying time with fewer wring outs, making it an indispensable tool for both professional detailers and car enthusiasts. Its large size and superior absorbency ensure that it can tackle extensive drying tasks efficiently, covering more surface area with each pass. This cloth is ideal for bodywork and glass, offering a versatile solution for all your cleaning needs. The unique waffle weave design not only enhances its absorbent properties but also ensures a streak-free, spotless finish on all surfaces. Crafted from premium microfibre, this cloth features statically charged cleaning fibres that attract and trap dust, dirt, and moisture effortlessly. Unlike ordinary cloths, the Goodyear Microfibre Waffle Cloth leaves a lint-free finish, ensuring your vehicle looks pristine and showroom-ready after every use. Its gentle texture is safe for all surfaces, preventing scratches and swirls, making it suitable for use on paintwork, glass, chrome, and plastics. Durable and long-lasting, this cloth can withstand numerous washes while maintaining its superior performance. Its vibrant large size allows for easy handling and maximum coverage, reducing the need for multiple cloths and making the drying process more efficient. Whether you're drying your car after a wash or detailing the interior, this cloth's exceptional design ensures optimal results every time.
